gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
VB
with
OBJ
and
OBJ

sense.def:
To owe money to someone
pomeni, da smo si od nekoga izposodili denar in ga še nismo vrnili.

seg.quote: I still owe you seven pounds.
I paid Gower what I owed him.

sense.def:
To owe a quality or ability to someone or something
pomeni imeti neko lastnost ali sposobnost po zaslugi določene osebe ali stvari.

seg.quote: She owed her technique entirely to his teaching.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
and
OBJ
or
VB
with
OBJ
and
PREP
‘to’

sense.def:
To owe gratitude, respect, or loyalty to someone
pomeni, da nekdo zasluži našo hvaležnost, spoštovanje ali zvestobo;

seg.quote: We owe you our thanks, Dr Marlowe.
Neither he nor Melanie owe me any explanation.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
owing to
uvajamo razlog za nekaj.

seg.quote: I missed my flight owing to a traffic hold-up.
